strings.cp_msg_domain_delete_multi: The selected domains have been deleted.
strings.cp_msg_domain_delete_multi_failure: The selected domains were unable to be deleted.
strings.domain_err_admin_bad: Domain admin does not exist (or is root)
strings.domain_err_email_addrs_bad: Bad number for email addresses limit
strings.cp_domains_admin_eus: Allow the Domain Admin to create:
strings.cp_domains_unlimited_eu: An unlimited number of end users
strings.cp_domains_admin_emails: Allow the Domain Admin to create:
strings.cp_domains_unlimited_emails: An unlimited number of email addresses
strings.cp_domains_logs_no: Do not create or store website logs
strings.cp_domains_catchall_1: Reject mail - return as unknown user
strings.domain_list_hlp_long_sa:
The Domains list displays all virtual host domains that are currently configured in the account.
Server disk space information is displayed as a total for the Server Admin or Domain Admin associated with the current list view. Disk space usage is also displayed for individual virtual host domains in the list. This information is updated each time the list is filtered.
Disabling a virtual host domain
Disabling a virtual host domain temporarily disables web and mail services on the domain. While disabled, domain users will not be able to retrieve mail or access the account through the Control Panel, FTP or shell (telnet or ssh). Domain settings and mail are not deleted when the domain is disabled.
Deleting a virtual host domain
Deleting a virtual host domain permanently removes all of the virtual host information from the server. The system cannot delete a virtual host domain until all End Users associated with the domain are deleted.
strings.domain_list_hlp_long_da:
Your Domains list displays all virtual host domains that are currently configured in your account.
Server disk space information is displayed as a total for your account and individually for your virtual host domains in the list. This information is updated each time the list is filtered.
Disabling a virtual host domain
Disabling a virtual host domain temporarily disables web and mail services on the domain. While disabled, domain users will not be able to retrieve mail or access the account through the Control Panel, FTP or shell (telnet or ssh). Domain settings and mail are not deleted when the domain is disabled.
strings.cp_instr_domain_add:
Create a virtual host domain for a user.
Define the domain name, web services, user and email address limits, and Website log settings for this virtual host domain.
strings.cp_instr_domain_add_preview:
Preview, Edit and Save the virtual host domain you just defined.
Select Save to add this virtual host domain to your account.
strings.cp_instr_domain_add_da: Add the domain to the following user:
strings.domain_add_error_invalid_domain: The Domain must be a valid domain name format
strings.domain_add_error_invalid_domain_alias: Each Domain Alias must be specified in a valid domain name format
strings.domain_add_error_null_eus: A value for maximum end users is required.
strings.domain_add_error_fmt_eus: The value for the maximum end users must be an integer value greater than or equal to zero.
strings.domain_add_error_null_ems: A value for maximum email addresses is required.
strings.domain_add_error_fmt_ems: The value for the maximum email addresses must be an integer value greater than or equal to zero.
strings.domain_add_error_invalid_contact: The Domain Contact must be a valid email address format
strings.domain_add_error_null_catchall: A Mail Catchall delivery email address is required.
strings.domain_add_error_invalid_catchall: The Mail Catchall delivery destination must be a valid email address format.
strings.domain_add_error_vaddhost_failed: The system command to add the domain failed ('vaddhost').
strings.domain_add_confirm_www_not_alias: Normally, 'www' is set as a server alias. Are you sure that you want 'www' as part of the host domain name?
strings.domain_add_setup_hlp_long:
Adding a virtual host domain to a user's account
You may add a virtual host domain to two types of user accounts:
Existing Domain Admins
End Users of the primary server domain
Enabling Web Services
You may enable CGI and SSL services for each domain:
CGI permits CGI scripts in the cgi-bin directory for the domain.
SSL allows secure HTTPS connections using a shared certificate.
Configuring Website Logs
Website logs are text files that record visitors' requests for web pages, images, and other files or programs. All requests are logged in a file named domain_name-access_log. Website logs must be created and stored if a third party statistics program is used.
strings.domain_add_preview_hlp_long:
The Preview summarizes the current virtual host domain settings.
Changing Domain Setup
The virtual host domain is not created until you select Save or Save / Create Another. On save, the Apache web server will be restarted automatically. You may change the information you have entered by selecting Previous to step backward through the form.
strings.cp_instr_domain_properties: Select edit to update the properties for the virtual host domain.
strings.domain_properties_js_verify_disable: Are you sure you want to disable this domain and all of its users?
strings.domain_properties_js_action_verify_delet: Are you sure you want to delete this domain?
strings.domain_properties_js_button_verify_delet: Are you sure you want to delete the selected domain(s)?
No items have been selected. Please make a selection and try again.
strings.domain_properties_hlp_long:
The Properties summarizes the current virtual host domain settings.
Changing Domain Setup
Select Edit to change the settings for this virtual host domain.
strings.cp_instr_domain_edit: Edit the domain setup for the virtual host domain
strings.domain_edit_error_invalid_domain_alias: Each Domain Alias must be specified in a valid domain name format
strings.domain_edit_error_null_eus: A value for maximum end users is required.
strings.domain_edit_error_fmt_eus: The value for the maximum end users must be an integer value greater than or equal to zero.
strings.domain_edit_error_null_ems: A value for maximum email addresses is required.
strings.domain_edit_error_fmt_ems: The value for the maximum email addresses must be an integer value greater than or equal to zero.
strings.domain_edit_error_invalid_contact: The Domain Contact must be a valid email address format
strings.domain_edit_error_null_catchall: A Mail Catchall delivery email address is required.
strings.domain_edit_error_invalid_catchall: The Mail Catchall delivery destination must be a valid email address format
strings.domain_edit_hlp_long_sa:
Enabling Web Services
You may enable CGI and SSL services for each domain:
CGI permits CGI scripts in the cgi-bin directory for the domain.
SSL allows secure HTTPS connections using a shared certificate.
Configuring Website Logs
Website logs are text files that record visitors' requests for web pages, images, and other files or programs. All requests are logged in a file named domain_name-access_log. Website logs must be created and stored if a third party statistics program is used.
Saving changes
On save, the Apache web server will be restarted automatically.
strings.domain_edit_hlp_long_da:
Understanding Web Services
CGI permits CGI scripts in the cgi-bin directory for the domain.
SSL allows secure HTTPS connections using a shared certificate.
Understanding Website Logs
Website logs are text files that record visitors' requests for web pages, images, and other files or programs. All requests are logged in a file named domain_name-access_log. Website logs must be created and stored if a third party statistics program is used.
Saving changes
On save, the Apache web server will be restarted automatically.
strings.domain_csr_instr: Enter values for the indicated fields. All fields are required except "Organizational Unit" and "Email".
strings.domain_csr_help_short: Values are for the indicated fields. All fields are required except "Organizational Unit" and "Email".
strings.domain_csr_help_long: Values are for the indicated fields. All fields are required except "Organizational Unit" and "Email".
strings.domain_csr_company_instr: No symbols (e.g. XY & Z Corp = XYZ Corporation)
strings.domain_selfcert_instr: This function will create a self-signed certificate, install it, and apply it to the selected applications.
strings.domain_selfcert_help_short: Enter the domain name for which to create and apply a self-signed certificate. Select which applications to apply the certificate to.
strings.domain_selfcert_help_long: Enter the domain name for which to create and apply a self-signed certificate. Select which applications to apply the certificate to.
strings.domain_selfcert_understand: I am positive that I want to create a self-signed certificate, install it, and apply to the selected applications.
strings.domain_selfcert_js_error_applied: You must select at least one application to apply a certificate to.
strings.domain_selfcert_js_error_understand: You must check the box to acknowledge that you actually want to perform this action.
strings.domain_selfcert_js_confirmation: This action could cause problems if you do not completely understand what you are doing. Are you absolutely positive that you want to create and install a self-signed certificate for this domain?
strings.domain_cert_instr: This function will install a certificate, intermediate certificate, or both, and apply it to the selected applications. You must enter at least one of "Certificate" or "Intermediate Certificate".
strings.domain_cert_help_short: Select the domain name for which to apply a certificate or intermediate certificate, or both. Select which applications to apply the certificate to.
strings.domain_cert_help_long: Select the domain name for which apply a certificate or intermediate certificatem, or both. Select which applications to apply the certificate to.
strings.domain_cert_key_instr: If you are installing a certificate that was created somewhere other than using the "Create CSR" function, you need to enter a valid key.
strings.domain_cert_understand: I am positive that I want to install a certificate, and apply to the selected applications.
strings.domain_cert_js_error_understand: You must check the box to acknowledge that you actually want to perform this action.
strings.domain_cert_js_error_applied: You must select at least one application to apply a certificate to.
strings.domain_cert_js_confirmation: This action could cause problems if you do not completely understand what you are doing. Are you absolutely positive that you want to install a certificate for this domain?
strings.domain_cert_js_required: You must enter at least one of "Certificate" or "Intermediate Certificate".
strings.domain_cert_error_uninstall_inuse: Domain certificate is already in use
